title: Resolve a Lost Item Request
description: A rider reports they left their phone in a driver's car. A support agent must facilitate its return.

tasks.description: Find the trip details using the rider's account information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the trip and the driver.

tasks.description: Send an anonymized message to the driver asking if they found the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: A message is sent to the driver without revealing the rider's contact information.

tasks.description: The driver confirms they have the phone. The agent coordinates a time and public place for the rider and driver to meet for the return.
tasks.expected_outcome: A safe and convenient return is arranged.
